modmenu.summaryTranslation.modid: Simply right-click items on a lava bucket or flint and steel directly in your inventory to burn them!
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.modid: Simply right-click items on a lava bucket or flint and steel directly in your inventory to burn them!
burnit.config.title: Burn It Settings
burnit.config.burnsources.desc:
List of Item IDs that can burn other items.

Use minecraft: prefix for vanilla items, and Mod ID for modded items.

For more information, follow the link: minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Item
burnit.config.keepdurability.desc:
Determines if the source item loses durability when burning.

Durability is only consumed on the first burn, mimicking lighting a fire in the world
burnit.config.prevent.desc: Settings for items that cannot be burned
burnit.config.preventfireresistant.desc: Prevents burning of fire-resistant items, such as netherite and its derivatives. Modded items are supported
burnit.config.preventburnsources.desc: Prevents burning one burn source against another. Burning an item against the exact same source is always forbidden
burnit.config.preventenchanteditems.desc: Prevents burning of any enchanted items
burnit.config.preventcustomitems.desc:
List of Item IDs that can never be burned under any conditions.

Use minecraft: prefix for vanilla items, and Mod ID for mods.

For more information, follow the link: minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Item
burnit.config.sounds.burn.desc: Short sound played when an item is burned
burnit.config.sounds.burn.toggle.desc: Toggles the sound without needing to change the master volume
burnit.config.sounds.burn.string.desc:
ID of the sound event played on burn.

For more information, follow the link: minecraft.wiki/w/Sounds.json
burnit.config.sounds.burn.pitch.desc:
The pitch of the played sound.

The higher the value, the higher and faster the played sound
burnit.config.sounds.burn.volume.desc: The volume of the played sound
burnit.config.sounds.fire.desc:
Looping sound after the first burn, while the menu is open.

Used to notify the player that durability has already been used and further burns are free
burnit.config.sounds.fire.toggle.desc: Toggles the sound without needing to change the master volume
burnit.config.sounds.fire.string.desc:
ID of the sound event played after the first burn, while the menu is open.

For more information, follow the link: minecraft.wiki/w/Sounds.json
burnit.config.sounds.fire.pitch.desc:
The pitch of the played sound.

The higher the value, the higher and faster the played sound
burnit.config.sounds.fire.volume.desc: The volume of the played sound
burnit.config.sounds.extinguish.desc: Short sound played when closing inventory after source durability consumption
burnit.config.sounds.extinguish.toggle.d: Toggles the sound without needing to change the master volume
burnit.config.sounds.extinguish.string.d:
ID of the sound event played when closing inventory after durability use.

For more information, follow the link: minecraft.wiki/w/Sounds.json
burnit.config.sounds.extinguish.pitch.de:
The pitch of the played sound.

The higher the value, the higher and faster the played sound
burnit.config.sounds.extinguish.volume.d: The volume of the played sound
